item.title: Migrating blog to Blogdown
item.author: m.harper@outlook.com (Michael Harper)
item.description: I have been delaying it for a while, but I finally decided to move to blogdown. This post is designed to quickly capture my reasons for me changing, and highlight some of the features that may make you consider doing the same. Note: this post does not intend to be a full tutorial on how to set up your blog.
